title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.40 - Vehicles so loaded, constructed, operated, equipped or maintained as to endanger persons or property, or to obstruct traffic barred from terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.40 - Vehicles so loaded, constructed, operated, equipped or maintained as to endanger persons or property, or to obstruct traffic barred from terminal

State Regulations

No vehicle which is loaded in such a manner, or with
such materials or is so constructed, operated, equipped or maintained as to be
likely to endanger persons or property, or to obstruct traffic, shall be
permitted in or upon a truck terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
